tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE media_regulatory_bodies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  organization_name VARCHAR(50),
  audit_date DATE,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE audits (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id INT,
    body_id INT,
    audit_date DATE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE media_organizations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    regulatory_body_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (regulatory_body_id) REFERENCES regulatory_bodies(id)
);

CREATE TABLE audits (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE NOT NULL,
    media_organization_id INT,
    auditor_id INT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (media_organization_id) REFERENCES media_organizations(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (auditor_id) REFERENCES auditors(id)
);

CREATE TABLE AuditTrail (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    org_id INT,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255),
    audit_result BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES MediaOrganization(org_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AuditFindings (
    finding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT,
    finding_description TEXT,
    finding_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES AuditTrail(audit_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceHistory (
    org_id INT,
    standard_id INT,
    audit_id INT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (org_id) REFERENCES MediaOrganization(org_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (standard_id) REFERENCES RegulatoryStandards(standard_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES AuditTrail(audit_id)
);
